## Tasks
- [ ] Open Pull Request
- [ ] Gain knowledge about different best practices

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Documented
- [ ] Merged in master
- [ ] Linter is okay
- [ ] Tests are written and green
- [ ] Code Review done
- [ ] Reviewed by PO
